definitions.definition: The set of smooth parametrizations of a given set X {\displaystyle X} ; the set of smooth maps S → X {\displaystyle S\rightarrow X} , where S {\displaystyle S} is any open set ⊆ R n {\displaystyle \subseteq \mathbb {R} ^{n}} ; the theory of such constructs.

main_definition: ( differential geometry ) The set of smooth parametrizations of a given set X {\displaystyle X} ; the set of smooth maps S → X {\displaystyle S\rightarrow X} , where S {\displaystyle S} is any open set ⊆ R n {\displaystyle \subseteq \mathbb {R} ^{n}} ; the theory of such constructs.
